message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a limited time. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10500?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $12000 might be a stretch, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you a deal at $11500. This is a great price for a product of this quality, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11500 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10000?

I understand that $10000 is a good price, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I can offer you a deal at $11000. This is a fair price for a product of this quality, and I'm willing to make a compromise. Let's meet in the middle and see if we can come to an agreement.

I'm starting to think that I'm not going to be able to meet you in the middle, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $9800, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget.
